description.en: Unleash the full potential of your BMW 1 Series F21 with Activate Individual Sport Mode.  This dynamic setting sharpens throttle response, enhances steering precision, and adjusts the transmission for a more engaging and exhilarating driving experience, tailored precisely to your preferences.  Experience the ultimate in driver-focused performance.
description.ar: أطلق العنان لإمكانات سيارتك BMW الفئة الأولى F21 الكاملة مع تنشيط وضع الرياضة الفردي. هذا الإعداد الديناميكي يحسّن استجابة دواسة الوقود، ويعزز دقة التوجيه، ويضبط ناقل الحركة لتجربة قيادة أكثر إثارة ومتعة، مصممة خصيصاً لتناسب تفضيلاتك. جرب أقصى درجات الأداء الذي يركز على السائق.
description.he: שחררו את מלוא הפוטנציאל של ה-BMW סדרה 1 F21 שלכם עם מצב הספורט האינדיבידואלי. הגדרה דינמית זו מחדדת את תגובת המצערת, משפרת את דיוק ההיגוי, ומכווננת את תיבת ההילוכים לחוויית נהיגה מרתקת ומסעירה יותר, שתותאם בדיוק להעדפותיכם. חוו את שיא הביצועים המתמקדים בנהג.

description.en: Effortlessly close all your windows from a distance with the key fob.  A simple press ensures your BMW 1 Series F21 remains secure and protected from the elements, even when you're away. Experience the ultimate in convenient control and peace of mind.

title.ar: تفعيل فتح صندوق الأمتعة من المفتاح

description.en: Effortlessly access your 1 Series F21's trunk with a simple press of a button on your key fob.  No more fumbling for keys or struggling with handles – unlock and open the boot with refined ease and convenience. Experience the seamless integration of intelligent design and effortless functionality.

Experience the signature BMW welcome.  Activate the Welcome Light Function on your 1 Series F21 to illuminate the ground beneath your doors with a subtle, yet sophisticated, glow, enhancing both your entry and exit experience. This feature adds a touch of personalized flair and effortless elegance.

Instantly access vital engine data at a glance.  The Activate Engine Information Display on your BMW 1 Series F21 provides real-time feedback on key performance parameters, empowering you with crucial information for a more engaged and informed driving experience.  Seamlessly integrated into your instrument cluster, it enhances your understanding of your vehicle's performance.

Experience effortless lane changes with the 1 Series F21's innovative 5-times comfort turn signals.  A gentle, five-flash activation ensures superior visibility to surrounding drivers, enhancing safety and significantly reducing the effort required for signaling.  This subtle yet smart feature elevates your driving experience with understated sophistication.

title.ar: رسوم متحركة لشعار M عند بدء التشغيل

description.en: Ignite your driving passion with the exclusive M Logo Startup Animation, projected onto the ground as your 1 Series F21 awakens.  This captivating display, a hallmark of M performance, adds a touch of unmistakable BMW M character and visual excitement to every journey.

Command the road with the M View Style Cluster in your BMW 1 Series F21.  Its dynamic, motorsport-inspired design provides crucial driving information with exceptional clarity and a distinctly sporty aesthetic, seamlessly integrating into the cockpit's premium ambiance.  Experience enhanced driver engagement and a more intuitive driving experience.

Experience the perfectly balanced driving dynamics of your BMW 1 Series F21 in its default mode.  Engine response, steering feel, and transmission behaviour are meticulously calibrated for a refined yet engaging experience, offering the ideal blend of comfort and sportiness for everyday driving. This setting provides the optimal starting point, ready to be personalized further to your preferences.

Experience enhanced security with the 1 Series F21's Horn on Secure feature.  A short blast of the horn automatically sounds when locking your vehicle, providing an extra layer of audible confirmation and deterring potential theft.  Enjoy peace of mind knowing your BMW is protected.

Maintain optimal tire pressure and temperature for enhanced safety, handling, and fuel efficiency.  The 1 Series F21's TPMS system provides real-time pressure and temperature readings directly on your dashboard, allowing for proactive maintenance and a more confident driving experience.

Experience the ultimate in driver awareness with the 1 Series F21's iDrive Warnings system.  Receive timely and clear alerts for critical driving situations, such as lane departure or potential collisions, seamlessly integrated into your iDrive interface for enhanced safety and peace of mind.  Proactive warnings help you maintain control and navigate confidently.

title.ar: مصابيح ضباب أمامية مع الضوء العالي
title.en: Front Fog Lights w/ High Beams
title.he: פנסי ערפל קדמיים עם אור גבוה

description.en: Dominate the road, even in challenging conditions.  The 1 Series F21's integrated front fog lights with high beam functionality provide superior visibility and enhanced safety during inclement weather or low-light situations, ensuring confident driving in any environment.

title.ar: مصابيح ضباب أمامية مع أضواء الوقوف
title.en: Front Fog Lights w/ Parking Lights
title.he: פנסי ערפל קדמיים עם אורות חניה

description.en: Enhance your 1 Series F21's visibility and assertive road presence with integrated front fog lights incorporating parking light functionality.  These elegantly integrated lights provide superior illumination in challenging weather conditions, while also serving as stylish daytime running lights, ensuring you're seen and stand out.

Unleash the full potential of your BMW 1 Series F21 with Sport+ Mode.  Experience sharpened throttle response, a more aggressive transmission mapping, and enhanced dynamic stability control for a truly exhilarating driving experience.  Feel the raw power and precision engineered into every element of your machine.

Experience unparalleled awareness with the BMW 1 Series F21's X-View Display.  This innovative system provides a comprehensive bird's-eye view of your surroundings, enhancing maneuverability in tight spaces and significantly improving parking precision.  Navigate confidently, even in the most challenging environments.

title.ar: عرض ضغط الإطارات في لوحة العدادات
title.he: תצוגת לחץ אוויר בצמיגים בלוח המחוונים

description.en: Maintain optimal tire pressure and enhance your 1 Series F21's handling with the integrated Tire Pressure Display.  This convenient feature provides real-time monitoring directly on your dashboard, allowing for proactive maintenance and improved fuel efficiency, ensuring a safer and more enjoyable driving experience.

Experience the thrill of precise control with the 1 Series F21's meticulously designed speedometer scale display.  Its clear, high-contrast numerals ensure effortless monitoring of your speed, enhancing both driving focus and the overall cockpit experience.  This driver-centric design element seamlessly integrates with the vehicle's dynamic performance.

Experience unparalleled control and precision with the 1 Series F21's refined Roll Stability Control (RSC) sensitivity.  This advanced system subtly adjusts stability interventions, ensuring a more natural and engaging driving feel, particularly noticeable during spirited maneuvers.  Enjoy enhanced driver confidence and a heightened sense of connection to the road without compromising safety.

Experience unparalleled comfort in your BMW 1 Series F21 with our advanced seat heating and cooling memory function.  Enjoy perfectly customized temperatures, automatically recalling your preferred settings upon entry, for a consistently luxurious and personalized driving experience.  Effortlessly transition between soothing warmth and refreshing coolness, whatever the season.

Experience the ultimate in peace of mind with Self Locking Time.  This intelligent feature automatically locks your BMW 1 Series F21's doors after a pre-set period of inactivity, ensuring your vehicle remains secure even if you momentarily forget.  Configure your preferred locking delay for seamless integration into your daily routine.

Experience unwavering peace of mind with the 1 Series F21's Power Front Windows Safety feature.  Automatic window reversal prevents potential injury by instantly reversing the window's movement if an obstruction is detected.  This intelligent safety system adds an extra layer of protection for you and your passengers.

In critical situations, the BMW 1 Series F21's Emergency Braking Lights instantly alert drivers behind you with rapid flashing brake lights, significantly reducing the risk of rear-end collisions. This proactive safety feature provides an extra layer of protection for you and other road users, enhancing your overall driving experience and peace of mind.

Experience superior illumination and a distinct BMW signature with the integrated LED license plate lights on your 1 Series F21.  These energy-efficient LEDs provide brighter, clearer illumination than traditional bulbs, enhancing visibility and adding a touch of modern sophistication to the rear of your vehicle.

Experience enhanced situational awareness with the 1 Series F21's Assisted Driving View.  This sophisticated system provides a comprehensive visual representation of your surroundings, including blind spots and potential hazards, significantly improving safety and driver confidence.  Navigate complex driving scenarios with greater ease and peace of mind.

Experience the subtle yet reassuring click of your BMW 1 Series F21 unlocking.  Acoustic Unlock Confirmation provides a discreet auditory signal, instantly verifying your vehicle's security and adding a touch of refined BMW engineering to the unlocking process.  Enjoy the peace of mind knowing your car has responded to your key.

Experience effortless lane changes with the 1 Series F21's sophisticated Automatic Lane Change assist.  This advanced system monitors surrounding traffic and gently guides your vehicle into the adjacent lane, enhancing both safety and driving comfort on the open road.  Enjoy a more relaxed and confident driving experience, particularly during highway driving.

Immerse yourself in the unparalleled acoustic landscape crafted by Bower & Wilkins.  Experience rich, detailed sound reproduction with every note precisely engineered for the BMW 1 Series F21 cabin, transforming every journey into a concert.  This premium audio system elevates your driving experience beyond the ordinary.

Ensure seamless integration and optimal performance of your BMW 1 Series F21's electrical systems.  12V Battery Registration allows the vehicle's computer to accurately identify and manage the new battery, preventing potential errors and maximizing battery lifespan. This crucial step is essential after battery replacement for a consistently reliable driving experience.

Ensure optimal braking performance and responsiveness in your BMW 1 Series F21.  This procedure electronically resets the brake pad wear sensors, providing accurate readings on your instrument cluster and preventing premature brake warning light illumination. Ensure optimal braking performance and longevity for your BMW 1 Series F21.  This procedure electronically resets the rear brake pad wear sensors, providing accurate and reliable brake system monitoring. Maintain peak performance and ensure your BMW 1 Series F21 operates flawlessly. Experience peak braking performance with the 2 Series' innovative Brake Fluid Reset feature. Don't compromise on safety; utilize the Brake Fluid Reset function for a superior and secure driving experience every time. Maintain peak performance and extend the life of your BMW 2 Series engine with our effortless Engine Oil Reset service. No more guesswork, no more missed maintenance intervals – just the precision and peace of mind that comes with owning a BMW. This ensures optimal engine health and protects your valuable investment, keeping your 2 Series performing at its absolute best for miles to come. Avoid potential engine damage and unnecessary repairs by utilizing this critical maintenance function correctly.
description.ar: حافظ على أداء الذروة ومد عمر محرك سيارتك BMW الفئة 2 مع خدمة إعادة ضبط زيت المحرك السهلة لدينا.  لا يقتصر الأمر على إعادة ضبط ضوء المؤشر فقط؛ بل يتعلق الأمر بضمان استمرار محركك المتطور في تقديم تجربة القيادة المثيرة التي تتوقعها. بعد تغيير الزيت، ما عليك سوى استخدام نظام السيارة البديهي هذا (أو عبر تطبيق BMW ConnectedDrive) لإعادة ضبط مؤشر خدمة الزيت بدقة. لا مزيد من التخمين، ولا مزيد من فترات الصيانة المفقودة - فقط الدقة وراحة البال التي تأتي مع امتلاك سيارة BMW. هذا يضمن الصحة المثلى للمحرك ويحمي استثمارك القيم، مما يحافظ على أداء سيارتك من الفئة 2 بأفضل حالاتها على مدى أميال قادمة. تجنب ضرر المحرك المحتمل والإصلاحات غير الضرورية باستخدام وظيفة الصيانة هذه بشكل صحيح.
description.he: שמרו על ביצועים שיאים והאריכו את חיי המנוע של ה-BMW סדרה 2 שלכם עם שירות איפוס שמן מנוע קל ופשוט. זה לא רק איפוס נורה; זהו  הבטחת המשך פעולתו התקינה של המנוע המתוחכם שלכם,  והבטחת חוויית נהיגה מרגשת כפי שאתם מצפים. לאחר החלפת שמן, פשוט השתמשו במערכת האינטואיטיבית שבתוך הרכב (או באמצעות אפליקציית BMW ConnectedDrive) כדי לאפס במדויק את מדד טיפולי השמן. לא עוד ניחושים, לא עוד החמצת מרווחי תחזוקה – רק הדיוק ושקט הנפש הנלווים להחזקה של BMW. זה מבטיח בריאות אופטימלית של המנוע ומגן על ההשקעה היקרה שלכם,  ומבטיח שה-2 סדרה שלכם תמשיך לבצע ברמה הגבוהה ביותר לקילומטרים רבים. הימנעו מפגיעה פוטנציאלית במנוע ותיקונים מיותרים באמצעות שימוש נכון בתפקוד תחזוקה קריטי זה.

description.en: Experience precision braking every time with the BMW 2 Series' innovative Front Brake Pads Reset feature.  This isn't just about a simple warning light; it's about proactive maintenance and peak performance.  Our intelligent system monitors pad wear with exceptional accuracy, providing a timely and precise alert when a replacement is due.  Avoid unexpected brake failures and maintain optimal stopping power by staying informed. This sophisticated feature allows you to schedule brake pad replacement conveniently, maximizing the lifespan of your brakes while ensuring your safety and driving enjoyment.  Don't let worn brake pads compromise your driving experience – let the 2 Series' Front Brake Pads Reset keep you in complete control.
description.ar: استمتع بتجربة فرامل دقيقة في كل مرة مع ميزة إعادة ضبط كُتل فرامل BMW 2 Series الأمامية المبتكرة.  لا يقتصر الأمر على مجرد مصباح إنذار بسيط؛ بل يتعلق الأمر بصيانة استباقية وأداءٍ مثالي.  يرصد نظامنا الذكي تآكل الكتل بدقة استثنائية، مما يوفر تنبيهًا دقيقًا وفي الوقت المناسب عند الحاجة إلى الاستبدال. تجنب أعطال الفرامل غير المتوقعة وحافظ على قوة كبح مثالية من خلال البقاء على اطلاع. تتيح لك هذه الميزة المتطورة جدولة استبدال كتل الفرامل بسهولة، مما يزيد من عمر الفرامل مع ضمان سلامتك ومتعتك في القيادة. لا تدع كتل الفرامل البالية تُعيق تجربة قيادتك – دع ميزة إعادة ضبط كتل الفرامل الأمامية في سيارة 2 Series تحافظ على سيطرتك الكاملة.
description.he: חווּ אֶת דִּיוּק הַּבְּלִימָה בְּכָל פַּעַם עִם תּכוּנַת איפוס רפידות הַּבְּרֵקִים הַקּדְּמִיּוֹת החדשנית של סדרת 2 BMW. זֶה אִינֶנּוּ רַק אֹור אזהרה פשוט; זֶה עֵנִין של תחזוקה יזומה וביצועים מיטביים. המערכת החכמה שלנו מנטרת את בלאי הרפידות בדיוק יוצא מן הכלל, ומספקת התרעה מדויקת ובזמן הנכון כאשר נדרש החלפה. הימנעו מתקלות בלמים בלתי צפויות ושמרו על עוצמת בלימה אופטימלית באמצעות מעקב שוטף. תכונה משוכללת זו מאפשרת לכם לתזמן החלפת רפידות בלם בנוחות, תוך מקסום אורך החיים של הבלמים שלכם תוך שמירה על בטיחותכם והנאת הנהיגה שלכם. אל תנו לרפידות בלם שחוקות לפגוע בחוויית הנהיגה שלכם – תנו לתכונת איפוס רפידות הבלמים הקדמיות של סדרת 2 לשמור עליכם בשליטה מלאה.

description.en: Experience precise braking control and optimized performance with the BMW 2 Series' Rear Brake Pad Reset feature.  This isn't just about resetting a light; it's about ensuring your braking system operates at peak efficiency.  After replacing your rear brake pads, this intelligent system recalibrates the brake sensors for accurate wear monitoring and optimal Anti-lock Braking System (ABS) and Dynamic Stability Control (DSC) functionality.  This ensures consistent, reliable braking performance throughout the lifespan of your new pads, maximizing safety and extending the life of your brake system components.  Don't settle for compromised braking – experience the precision and peace of mind that comes with a properly reset system.  This simple yet crucial step, accessible through your vehicle's iDrive system, provides you with the control and confidence you deserve.

Maintain peak performance and keep your BMW 2 Series running smoothly with our intuitive Vehicle Check Reset feature.  This isn't just about clearing a warning light; it's about proactive vehicle health management.  A simple, in-car process allows you to reset service indicators after completing routine maintenance, ensuring your instrument cluster reflects the true state of your vehicle.  No more confusing warning lights or missed service appointments.  Vehicle Check Reset empowers you to stay informed and in control of your 2 Series' well-being, promoting long-term reliability and preserving the joy of driving.

Experience the thrill of the road with the 2 Series' Sport Displays.  These aren't just gauges; they're a dynamic extension of your driving experience.  Crisp, high-resolution graphics deliver vital performance data with breathtaking clarity, transforming your dashboard into a command center.  From a vibrant, customizable tachometer that pulses with the engine's rhythm to a comprehensive display of G-forces and lap times (where applicable), Sport Displays immerse you in the heart of the action.  Intuitive menus allow for easy personalization, letting you select the information most relevant to your driving style.  Forget static displays – with Sport Displays, the 2 Series transforms your daily commute into a spirited drive, providing you with real-time feedback and a visceral connection to the machine under your control.  This isn't just about seeing numbers; it's about feeling the performance.

Experience the ultimate in on-the-go entertainment with the BMW 2 Series' Video in Motion system.  While respecting all applicable local laws and regulations, this innovative feature allows select passengers to enjoy movies, TV shows, and other video content on the central infotainment display while the vehicle is in motion.  This doesn't just mean short clips;  prepare for immersive viewing experiences thanks to the high-resolution screen and seamless integration with your favorite streaming apps. Note:  The driver must always maintain full attention on the road, and the availability of video playback while driving may vary based on vehicle speed and local legal restrictions.  Video in Motion elevates your journeys from simple commutes to engaging adventures, ensuring everyone stays entertained during longer drives.   This feature is designed for passengers' enjoyment and does not compromise safety features.  For the ultimate cinematic experience on the road, choose the BMW 2 Series.

Effortlessly manage your towing needs with the innovative 2 Series Tow Hitch Display.  This isn't just a simple indicator; it's a sophisticated system seamlessly integrated into your infotainment screen.  Get real-time feedback on trailer connection status, ensuring safe and secure hitching every time.  Avoid costly mistakes and potential damage with clear visual cues that confirm proper alignment and prevent accidental disconnections. The Tow Hitch Display provides peace of mind, knowing your trailer is securely attached before you hit the road.  It's more than just convenience; it's intelligent towing assurance designed for the discerning 2 Series driver.

Experience unparalleled ease and safety with the BMW 2 Series' innovative 5 Times Comfort Turn Signals.  A subtle yet significant upgrade, this feature allows for a more intuitive and less abrupt signaling experience.  Instead of the standard single flash, activating your turn signal initiates five rapid flashes, providing increased visibility to surrounding drivers, especially in challenging conditions like heavy traffic or inclement weather. This isn't just about convenience; it's about proactive safety.  The refined flashing sequence enhances your awareness and helps other drivers anticipate your maneuvers, contributing to a smoother and safer driving experience.  This intelligent feature is seamlessly integrated into the 2 Series' design, reflecting BMW's commitment to both driver comfort and road safety.  Experience the difference – it’s a small detail that makes a big impact.

description.en: Ignite your senses with the electrifying M Logo Startup Animation, exclusive to the 2 Series.  As you turn the key or press the start button, witness the iconic BMW M logo blaze to life on the central display, a captivating visual prelude to the exhilarating performance awaiting you. This isn't just a splash screen; it's a statement. It's a visceral connection to the legendary M heritage, subtly hinting at the potent power simmering beneath the hood.  More than just a cosmetic enhancement, this animation elevates the driver experience, transforming each journey into a thrilling spectacle. Experience the pure adrenaline rush before you even touch the accelerator. This is M, redefined.

Experience the thrill of the road with the all-new M View Style Cluster in your BMW 2 Series.  This isn't just a digital instrument cluster; it's a meticulously crafted cockpit experience.  The vibrant, high-resolution display delivers crucial driving information with unparalleled clarity and style, dynamically adapting to your selected driving mode.  From the crisp, precise speedometer and tachometer to the intuitive menu navigation, every detail is engineered for seamless integration and optimal driver engagement.  Customize your view with selectable display options, showcasing performance metrics, navigation guidance, or entertainment information – all presented with an M-specific design language that elevates the driving experience to a new level.  Forget distractions; the M View Style Cluster keeps you informed and connected, empowering you to command the road with confidence and precision. Prepare for a driving experience that's as exhilarating as it is sophisticated.

The BMW 2 Series's Default Driving Mode isn't just a setting; it's a meticulously calibrated experience.  Engineered for everyday driving, this mode strikes the perfect balance between spirited performance and comfortable efficiency.  You'll enjoy responsive handling, precise steering, and optimized throttle response for a dynamic yet refined journey.  While easily customizable to your preference through the intuitive iDrive system, the Default Driving Mode serves as a testament to BMW's commitment to seamless integration of power and comfort, ensuring an enjoyable drive in any situation.  It's the intelligent starting point for every adventure in your 2 Series.

Experience unparalleled peace of mind with the 2 Series' innovative Horn on Secure feature.  This isn't just a horn; it's a proactive security measure.  Should an unauthorized attempt to access your vehicle be detected – whether through forced entry or tampering – the system will automatically trigger a loud, attention-grabbing horn blast. This immediate alert not only deters potential thieves but also significantly increases the chances of attracting nearby attention, deterring further action and potentially leading to quicker recovery.  The Horn on Secure feature adds a vital layer of protection to your already robust 2 Series security system, providing an extra safeguard against theft and vandalism.  It's a quiet assurance that your vehicle remains protected, even when you're not around.

Maintain optimal tire pressure and temperature for enhanced safety, handling, and fuel efficiency with the 2 Series G42's sophisticated TPMS.  Real-time pressure and temperature readings are clearly displayed, allowing for proactive tire maintenance and a consistently superior driving experience.

Experience the ultimate in proactive driving with iDrive Warnings.  Receive timely and clear alerts for potential hazards, from lane departures to approaching obstacles, enhancing your awareness and contributing to a safer, more confident driving experience in your BMW 2 Series G42.  These intelligent warnings seamlessly integrate with your iDrive system, providing crucial information without distraction.

description.en: Maintain optimal tire pressure effortlessly with the BMW 2 Series' integrated Tire Pressure Display.  This sophisticated system monitors tire pressure in real-time and displays the readings directly on your dashboard.  No more cumbersome manual checks or guesswork – ensuring optimal fuel efficiency, enhanced handling, and significantly improved safety.  The clear, intuitive display provides immediate alerts if pressure is low in any tire, proactively preventing potential blowouts and maximizing your driving experience.  Stay informed, stay in control, and stay safe with this essential feature that seamlessly blends advanced technology with everyday practicality.

description.en: Experience exhilarating performance with the 2 Series' meticulously engineered Speedometer Scale Display.  This isn't just a gauge; it's a visceral connection to the road.  The crisp, high-resolution display provides instant, accurate feedback on your speed, allowing for precise control and confident driving.  The intuitive design ensures effortless readability, even at a glance, minimizing distractions and maximizing your focus on the journey.  Feel the surge of power, monitor your speed with unwavering clarity, and experience driving redefined with the 2 Series' dynamic Speedometer Scale Display.  Its precision engineering and elegant presentation seamlessly integrate into the driver-focused cockpit, enhancing both the aesthetic appeal and driving experience.

Elevate your 2 Series driving experience with the Alpina Style Display.  This isn't just a cosmetic upgrade; it's a meticulously crafted digital instrument cluster that seamlessly integrates bespoke Alpina design cues with crucial performance data. Experience the thrill of driving with a vibrant, high-resolution display showcasing a unique Alpina-branded speedometer, tachometer, and intuitive interface.  The crisp graphics and customizable settings deliver a richer, more engaging driving experience, allowing you to monitor key performance metrics with unparalleled clarity. From the subtle Alpina branding to the dynamic animations, every detail has been painstakingly designed to reflect the legendary Alpina heritage and enhance the overall driving pleasure of your 2 Series.  This is more than a display; it's a statement.

Command the road with the redesigned 2 Series Instrument Cluster Logo.  More than just a visual element, this meticulously crafted emblem projects a sense of refined power and bespoke luxury.  The vibrant, high-resolution display ensures crystal-clear visibility of the logo, seamlessly integrated into the driver's digital experience.  Its subtle yet striking presence reinforces the 2 Series' athletic character, serving as a constant reminder of the exhilarating performance waiting to be unleashed.  Experience the thrill of driving with a logo that reflects your individual style and the unwavering quality of BMW engineering.

Experience unparalleled control with the BMW 2 Series' innovative Speed Correction system.  This isn't just cruise control; it's predictive speed assistance.  Utilizing advanced GPS data and real-time speed limit recognition, Speed Correction seamlessly adjusts your vehicle's speed to adhere to posted limits, minimizing the risk of unintentional speeding violations.  Beyond simple adherence, the system anticipates upcoming speed changes, smoothly decelerating or accelerating as necessary for a comfortable and confident driving experience.  No more frantic glances at speedometers – focus on the road ahead while maintaining optimal speed and legal compliance. Speed Correction isn't just a feature; it’s a testament to the 2 Series' commitment to driver assistance and peace of mind.

Experience unparalleled convenience and safety with the 2 Series' innovative Mirror Dip feature.  When reversing, the passenger-side mirror automatically dips downwards, providing an unobstructed view of the curb and eliminating blind spots. description.ar: حافظ على أداء فرامل ذروة في سيارتك BMW الفئة الثالثة G20 مع وظيفة إعادة ضبط سائل الفرامل البسيطة لدينا. هذه الخدمة الأساسية، التي يمكن الوصول إليها بسهولة من خلال نظام iDrive، تضمن استجابة فرامل مثالية وتساعد في المراقبة الدقيقة لصحة نظام فرامل سيارتك، مما يساهم في سلامتك وثقتك أثناء القيادة.
description.he: שמרו על ביצועי בלימה שיאים ב-BMW סדרה 3 G20 שלכם באמצעות פונקציית איפוס נוזל בלמים הפשוטה שלנו. שירות חיוני זה, שנגיש בקלות דרך מערכת ה-iDrive, מבטיח תגובת בלימה מיטבית וסיוע במעקב מדויק אחר בריאות מערכת הבלימה שלכם, תורם לבטיחותכם ולביטחונכם בנהיגה.

description.ar: حافظ على الأداء الأمثل وتأكد من أن سيارتك BMW الفئة الثالثة تعمل بسلاسة مع ميزة إعادة ضبط فحص السيارة البديهية لدينا.  هذا ليس مجرد مسح لمؤشر تحذير؛ بل هو إدارة استباقية للسيارة. بعد إجراء الصيانة الروتينية مثل تغيير الزيت أو تدوير الإطارات، ما عليك سوى استخدام واجهة السيارة سهلة الاستخدام أو تطبيق BMW ConnectedDrive لإعادة ضبط مؤشر الصيانة. لا مزيد من التخمين أو الرحلات إلى الوكيل لإعادة الضبط البسيطة.  يضمن هذا التكامل السلس أن تظل على اطلاع دائم بصحة سيارتك ويتيح لك جدولة الصيانة بشكل استباقي، مما يزيد من عمر الفئة الثالثة و متعة القيادة.  استمتع براحة البال التي تأتي مع معرفة أن صيانة سيارتك مُدارة بشكل مثالي، في متناول يديك.
description.he: שמרו על ביצועים מיטביים והבטיחו שה-BMW סדרה 3 שלכם פועלת בצורה חלקה באמצעות תכונת איפוס בדיקת הרכב האינטואיטיבית שלנו. זה לא רק לגבי כיבוי נורת אזהרה; זהו ניהול רכב יזום. לאחר ביצוע תחזוקה שגרתית כמו החלפת שמן או סיבוב צמיגים, פשוט השתמשו בממשק נוח למשתמש ברכב או באפליקציית BMW ConnectedDrive כדי לאפס את אינדיקטור השירות. לא עוד ניחושים או טיולים למוסך עבור איפוסים פשוטים. האינטגרציה החלקה הזו מבטיחה שתישארו מעודכנים לגבי מצב הרכב שלכם ומאפשרת לכם לתזמן תחזוקה באופן יזום, ובכך למקסם את אורך חיי הסדרה 3 שלכם ואת הנאת הנהיגה. חוו את השקט הנפשי שנובע מהידיעה שהתחזוקה של המכונית שלכם מנוהלת בצורה מושלמת, ממש בהישג ידכם.

The Mirror Dip Adjustment on the 4 Series:  a small feature with a big impact on your driving experience.

This isn't just about preventing rollovers; it's about enhancing the driving experience by subtly adjusting the car's responsiveness based on real-time driving conditions.  Our advanced system meticulously analyzes factors such as steering input, throttle application, and lateral acceleration, providing seamless adjustments to the chassis control systems.  This translates to a more predictable and confident handling feel, particularly on uneven surfaces or during spirited driving. You'll experience less body roll, improved grip, and enhanced steering precision, giving you greater control and confidence on any road. Forget jarring corrections; experience a refined, connected, and supremely controlled drive. RLS Sensitivity on the 4 Series isn't just a safety feature; it's a dynamic performance enhancer, seamlessly blending stability and agility for an exhilarating yet secure ride.

Experience the ultimate in peace of mind with the BMW 4 Series' innovative Self Locking Time feature.  This isn't just about locking your doors; it's about intelligent security tailored to your life.  Self Locking Time allows you to pre-program the exact moment your vehicle automatically locks, eliminating the worry of leaving your doors unlocked. Choose a specific time after you've exited the vehicle, ensuring your 4 Series remains secure, even if you're distracted or in a hurry.  No more second-guessing – just the confidence that your prized possession is protected.  Configurable through the intuitive iDrive system, Self Locking Time is a subtle yet powerful enhancement to the 4 Series' already impressive security suite.  This feature seamlessly integrates with the existing alarm system, offering an additional layer of protection against theft and unauthorized access.  It’s the smart, sophisticated security solution you’ve been waiting for.

A crystal-clear, high-resolution display intelligently combines data from multiple sensors – including cameras, radar, and ultrasonic sensors – to create a real-time, bird's-eye view of your vehicle and its immediate vicinity.  Navigate tight parking spaces with ease, confidently maneuver in challenging traffic, and benefit from enhanced awareness of potential hazards thanks to a dynamic, user-friendly interface. The system is designed to only activate when it's safe to do so, and it provides clear visual and haptic feedback to the driver, keeping you fully informed and in control.  It's not autonomous driving, but rather a thoughtful assist designed to make your driving experience smoother, safer, and more enjoyable. From the meticulously selected speakers to the advanced digital signal processing, every component is designed to reproduce audio with breathtaking fidelity.  Don't just hear your music; feel it. Experience the ultimate in peace of mind with the 3 Series G20's intelligent Auto Locking system.  Doors automatically secure at a pre-defined speed, eliminating the need to manually lock up and minimizing the risk of accidental unlocking.  Enjoy effortless security and enhanced protection on every journey.

Experience the ultimate in driving peace of mind with the Auto Locking Checkbox.  Simply check the box in your iDrive settings, and your BMW 3 Series G20 will automatically lock its doors once you reach a pre-defined speed, providing added security and reducing the risk of accidental unlocking.  Enjoy effortless convenience and enhanced safety, all within your control.

Project your BMW logo onto the ground as you approach your 3 Series G20.  This subtle yet sophisticated detail elevates the unlocking experience, adding a touch of understated luxury and visual flair to your arrival. A small detail, a significant statement.

The BMW 3 Series G20's athletic body style seamlessly blends performance-inspired design with everyday practicality. Its sculpted lines and dynamic proportions exude confidence, while the spacious cabin offers comfort and versatility for driver and passengers alike. Experience the perfect harmony of form and function.

The BMW 3 Series G20 empowers you to seamlessly manage your driving experience.  By default, the intelligent Start/Stop system is activated, optimizing fuel efficiency and minimizing emissions without compromising driving pleasure.  Easily adjust this setting to your preference via the iDrive menu.

Information updates seamlessly, ensuring you always have the most precise and immediate speed reading, contributing to a more confident and controlled driving experience.  This cutting-edge technology eliminates lag and enhances the overall driver interface.

Enjoy crisp visuals, seamless navigation, and effortless access to your favorite apps, all tailored for the ultimate driving experience.

Enjoy distraction-free driving with intuitive song selection directly in your line of sight, enhancing both safety and the driving experience.

Experience the unmistakable sonic signature of your BMW 3 Series G20.  Choose from a range of sophisticated alarm sounds, each meticulously crafted to deter potential threats with a distinct and assertive tone, providing an extra layer of security beyond the standard system.

Experience unrestricted access to your BMW 3 Series G20's full potential.  EPB Service Mode Deactivation allows for precise wheel and brake servicing, bypassing standard electronic parking brake limitations for enhanced technician efficiency and streamlined maintenance. This feature ensures your vehicle receives the most thorough and expert care.

Engineered for unwavering communication, the 3 Series G20's advanced Microphone Fault Deactivation system intelligently identifies and bypasses microphone malfunctions.  This ensures seamless voice control functionality for your navigation, phone calls, and BMW Intelligent Personal Assistant, preserving the premium in-car experience even in the event of a microphone issue.

Approach your BMW 3 Series G20 and experience seamless entry. Enjoy effortless access, perfectly complementing the sophisticated design and intelligent technology of your BMW.

Experience enhanced efficiency and performance with the 3 Series G20's Active Radiator Blind Control. Engineered for ultimate efficiency, the BMW 3 Series G20's extended oil maintenance interval allows for less frequent service visits, maximizing your driving time and minimizing downtime. Experience the seamless blend of performance and practicality that defines the BMW driving experience.

Experience effortless communication and enhanced connectivity across Europe.

Experience the subtle yet sophisticated welcome of your BMW 3 Series G20.  As you approach, ambient lighting gently illuminates the exterior, guiding you to your car.  Upon departure, the same soft glow bids you farewell, a thoughtful detail reflecting BMW's commitment to refined driving pleasure.

Ensure optimal safety and functionality of your BMW 3 Series G20's hazard warning lights with a comprehensive self-test.  This integrated function quickly verifies that all lights are working correctly, providing peace of mind and enhanced safety on the road.  A crucial element of preventative maintenance for optimal driving.

The BMW 3 Series G20's integrated front fog light test ensures optimal illumination in challenging weather conditions.  A simple yet crucial check during routine maintenance, it confirms the functionality of your fog lights, maximizing visibility and safety in low-visibility situations.  This proactive approach reflects BMW's commitment to your peace of mind.

The BMW 3 Series G20's innovative Front Left Cornering Light Test ensures optimal illumination during low-speed turns, enhancing driver visibility and safety in challenging conditions.  This rigorous testing process guarantees the precise beam pattern and intensity required for superior nighttime maneuvering, exceeding industry standards for performance and reliability.

The 3 Series G20's sophisticated diagnostics allow for a comprehensive test of the left rear parking light, ensuring optimal functionality and road safety.  This self-diagnostic feature proactively identifies potential issues, minimizing the risk of malfunctions and maintaining the vehicle's impeccable illumination.  A crucial element of preventative maintenance.

Experience the cutting-edge illumination of the BMW 3 Series G20's daytime driving lights.  Rigorously tested under diverse conditions, these lights ensure optimal visibility and a distinctive, confident presence on the road, enhancing both safety and style.

Experience the captivating Lights Showmode on your BMW 3 Series G20.  With dynamic lighting sequences projected onto the ground, this feature adds a dramatic and personalized welcome, enhancing both style and the overall driving experience.  It's more than just illumination; it's a statement.

Experience enhanced safety with the 3 Series G20's innovative two-stage brake lights.  Upon initial braking, the standard brake lights illuminate, providing initial warning.  Should harder braking be required, a secondary set of lights activates, dramatically increasing visibility and significantly reducing the risk of rear-end collisions.

Experience unparalleled nighttime visibility with the BMW 3 Series G20's advanced High Beam Lights Test.  This sophisticated system rigorously tests and calibrates your high beam headlights, ensuring optimal illumination and a significantly enhanced safety margin on dark roads.  Drive with confidence, knowing your high beams are performing at their peak.

This rigorous Front Right Cornering Light Test ensures optimal performance of your 3 Series G20's dynamic cornering lights.  We meticulously evaluate illumination intensity, beam pattern, and longevity to guarantee superior nighttime visibility and enhanced safety during turns.  Experience the unwavering BMW commitment to precision engineering and driving confidence.

Ensure optimal functionality of your 3 Series G20's right rear parking light with this comprehensive test.  This diagnostic check verifies proper illumination, guaranteeing both safety and compliance with traffic regulations.  A crucial element of preventative maintenance for unwavering reliability.

The BMW 3 Series G20's low beam lights undergo rigorous testing to ensure optimal illumination and driver safety.  Meeting stringent quality standards, these lights provide superior visibility in diverse driving conditions, enhancing nighttime driving confidence. This meticulous process guarantees a consistent, reliable, and powerful beam pattern.

Enjoy precisely tailored temperatures, instantly adapting to your preferences for a consistently perfect climate, regardless of the outside conditions.  Indulge in the ultimate driving pleasure, free from distractions of temperature discomfort.

Experience unparalleled comfort with the 3 Series G20's heated and cooled seats, featuring memory settings. This feature ensures your hands remain comfortable and alert, even in the harshest winter conditions.

Command complete control over your driving experience.  Deactivate instrument cluster warnings for a focused, distraction-free drive, ideal for track days or spirited journeys where you prioritize pure driving engagement.  Easily re-enable warnings when needed, offering unparalleled customization.

Maintain complete control of your driving experience.  Disable the low fuel warning light to prioritize uninterrupted focus on the road, ideal for track days or extended high-performance driving where frequent refueling isn't practical.  This setting can be easily toggled on or off as needed.

Reclaim the pristine, uncluttered dashboard of your BMW 3 Series G20. Simply and accurately reset your oil service indicator after an oil change, ensuring your BMW's onboard computer reflects the latest maintenance status for optimal engine health and continued driving pleasure.

Ensure optimal braking performance and responsiveness in your BMW 4 Series G22.  Our Front Brake Pads Reset service precisely calibrates your braking system after pad replacement, guaranteeing consistent stopping power and maximizing the lifespan of your new components. Maintain peak braking performance in your BMW 4 Series G22.  Our Rear Brake Pad Reset procedure precisely calibrates your vehicle's braking system after pad replacement, ensuring optimal stopping power and a seamless driving experience.  This crucial step guarantees consistent braking response and helps prolong the life of your brake components.

This convenient feature allows you to quickly clear any warning messages or service indicators, ensuring your driving experience remains seamless and uninterrupted.  Simply access the intuitive in-car menu to reset the system and reclaim your focus on the road ahead.

Immerse yourself in dynamic, driver-focused instrumentation that provides critical performance data with exhilarating clarity and precision, enhancing your driving experience and connection to the machine.  Every detail, from tachometer to speed readout, is meticulously designed for optimal readability and engagement.

Experience seamless entertainment on the go with BMW's Video in Motion.  Enjoy your favorite movies or shows on the central display while your 4 Series G22 is stationary or in motion (where legally permitted).  This feature transforms your driving experience into a personalized cinematic journey.

Effortlessly manage your towing needs with the 4 Series G22's integrated Tow Hitch Display.  This intelligent system provides real-time feedback on trailer stability and connection status directly on your iDrive display, ensuring a safe and convenient towing experience.  Maintain complete control and peace of mind, knowing your load is securely connected.

Experience effortless control of your BMW 4 Series G22 with Comfort Access via CA.  Seamlessly lock, unlock, and even start your vehicle without ever needing to reach for your key fob – a touch of luxury and convenience at your fingertips. Enjoy the freedom and enhanced security of keyless operation, a hallmark of BMW's commitment to intuitive driving.

Experience the unparalleled acoustic power of the BMW 4 Series G22's audio system.  Maximum Volume delivers a breathtakingly immersive soundscape, filling the cabin with rich, distortion-free audio at its peak output, transforming every drive into a concert.  Feel the pulse of the music, and let the powerful sound elevate your driving experience.

Experience the thrill of the 4 Series G22 before you even touch the wheel.  The bespoke iDrive startup animation, a dynamic display of BMW's signature design language, ignites the screen with breathtaking visuals, setting the stage for an unparalleled driving experience. This isn't just a startup; it's a statement.

Experience unparalleled precision with BMW's Speed Correction.  This advanced system subtly adjusts your vehicle's speed based on detected road conditions, ensuring optimal control and a smoother, more confident drive in the BMW 4 Series G22.  Enjoy enhanced driving dynamics without compromising the exhilarating performance you expect.

Experience effortless climate control with the 4 Series G22's HVAC Memory. Enjoy personalized comfort and seamless transitions between drivers.

Project your own initials or a unique emblem onto the digital display, subtly reflecting your individual style and enhancing the already captivating cockpit ambiance. Experience effortless driving in any weather.  BMW Rain Closing automatically activates your windows and sunroof at the first sign of rain, ensuring a dry and comfortable cabin without interrupting your focus on the road.  Enjoy the journey, rain or shine.

Experience effortless maneuvering with the 4 Series G22's intelligent Mirror Dip.  As you reverse, the passenger-side mirror automatically dips downwards, providing an unobstructed view of the curb and eliminating blind spots.  This subtle yet significant feature enhances safety and simplifies parking, reflecting the BMW commitment to driver-centric design.

Dominate the road with unparalleled confidence, thanks to the 4 Series' innovative Mirror Dip Adjustment.  This isn't just a convenience; it's a smart enhancement designed to improve visibility and safety, especially when reversing or navigating tight spaces.  With a simple adjustment, the driver-side mirror automatically dips downwards when reverse gear is engaged, providing a clear, unobstructed view of the curb and nearby obstacles.  No more awkward maneuvering or guesswork – just precise control and effortless parking.  Experience the difference that thoughtful engineering makes, and enjoy the peace of mind that comes with enhanced visibility.  The Mirror Dip Adjustment on the 4 Series:  a small feature with a big impact on your driving experience.

Experience the ultimate in driving control with the 4 Series' refined RLS (Roll Stability Limitation) Sensitivity.  This isn't just about preventing rollovers; it's about enhancing the driving experience by subtly adjusting the car's responsiveness based on real-time driving conditions.  Our advanced system meticulously analyzes factors such as steering input, throttle application, and lateral acceleration, providing seamless adjustments to the chassis control systems.  This translates to a more predictable and confident handling feel, particularly on uneven surfaces or during spirited driving. You'll experience less body roll, improved grip, and enhanced steering precision, giving you greater control and confidence on any road. Forget jarring corrections; experience a refined, connected, and supremely controlled drive. RLS Sensitivity on the 4 Series isn't just a safety feature; it's a dynamic performance enhancer, seamlessly blending stability and agility for an exhilarating yet secure ride.

Experience the ultimate in peace of mind with the BMW 4 Series' innovative Self Locking Time feature.  This isn't just about locking your doors; it's about intelligent security tailored to your life.  Self Locking Time allows you to pre-program the exact moment your vehicle automatically locks, eliminating the worry of leaving your doors unlocked. Choose a specific time after you've exited the vehicle, ensuring your 4 Series remains secure, even if you're distracted or in a hurry.  No more second-guessing – just the confidence that your prized possession is protected.  Configurable through the intuitive iDrive system, Self Locking Time is a subtle yet powerful enhancement to the 4 Series' already impressive security suite.  This feature seamlessly integrates with the existing alarm system, offering an additional layer of protection against theft and unauthorized access.  It’s the smart, sophisticated security solution you’ve been waiting for.

Experience unparalleled confidence and control on the road with the BMW 4 Series' Assisted Driving View. This cutting-edge system seamlessly integrates a suite of advanced driver-assistance technologies, providing a comprehensive, intuitive overview of your surroundings.  A crystal-clear, high-resolution display intelligently combines data from multiple sensors – including cameras, radar, and ultrasonic sensors – to create a real-time, bird's-eye view of your vehicle and its immediate vicinity.  Navigate tight parking spaces with ease, confidently maneuver in challenging traffic, and benefit from enhanced awareness of potential hazards thanks to a dynamic, user-friendly interface. Assisted Driving View isn't just about convenience; it's about significantly enhancing your safety and reducing driving stress, allowing you to focus on the pure joy of the drive.

Experience effortless lane changes with the 4 Series' innovative Automatic Lane Change system.  This advanced feature isn't just about convenience; it's about enhancing safety and reducing driver fatigue on long journeys.  Using sophisticated sensor technology, the system monitors surrounding traffic and, upon confirmation via the intuitive steering wheel controls, gently guides your 4 Series into the adjacent lane.  The system is designed to only activate when it's safe to do so, and it provides clear visual and haptic feedback to the driver, keeping you fully informed and in control.  It's not autonomous driving, but rather a thoughtful assist designed to make your driving experience smoother, safer, and more enjoyable.  Experience the difference – seamlessly navigate traffic and arrive refreshed.

Immerse yourself in a symphony of sound with the groundbreaking Bower & Wilkins Audio system in the BMW 4 Series.  Engineered for the discerning audiophile, this meticulously crafted system delivers an unparalleled listening experience.  Experience rich, detailed highs, deep resonant bass, and crystal-clear mids – all perfectly balanced to bring your favorite music to life.  From the meticulously selected speakers to the advanced digital signal processing, every component is designed to reproduce audio with breathtaking fidelity.  Don't just hear your music; feel it.  The Bower & Wilkins system in the 4 Series transforms your drive into a concert hall on wheels, setting a new standard for in-car audio excellence.  Experience the difference that superior engineering and world-renowned craftsmanship can make. Prepare to be captivated.

Maintain peak performance and seamless integration of your BMW 4 Series G22's sophisticated electronics.  Our intelligent 12V battery registration system ensures optimal charging and monitoring, preventing potential issues and preserving the longevity of your vehicle's advanced features. This ensures your driving experience remains uninterrupted and flawlessly efficient.

Command the symphony of your BMW 4 Series G22.  The Engine Sound Menu allows you to personalize your driving experience by selecting from a range of meticulously crafted engine sound profiles, from subtle and refined to powerful and exhilarating, perfectly complementing your chosen driving mode.  Tailor the auditory landscape to your exact preferences for an even more immersive and engaging drive.

Experience unparalleled comfort even on the coldest days with the 4 Series G22's automatic steering wheel heating.  A gentle warmth radiates through the wheel, melting away the chill and ensuring a supremely pleasant driving experience, automatically adjusting to your preferences.  Effortless luxury redefined.

Experience the unmistakable signature of the BMW 4 Series G22 with our distinctive Scandinavian DRLs.  These elegant, highly visible daytime running lights not only enhance your car's aesthetic appeal, but also significantly improve safety by increasing your daytime visibility to other drivers.  Their crisp, precise illumination showcases the sophisticated design language of the BMW brand.

description.ar: اختبر أداء فرامل ذروة الأداء مع ميزة إعادة ضبط سائل الفرامل المبتكرة من الفئة الثانية.  هذا ليس مجرد عنصر صيانة روتيني ؛ بل هو مكون أساسي لضمان قوة إيقاف ثابتة وموثوقة. بعد تغيير سائل الفرامل ، تقوم وظيفة إعادة ضبط سائل الفرامل بمعايرة نظام الفرامل المتطور بدقة ، مما يحسّن حساسيته ووقت استجابته. هذا يضمن كفاءة فرامل مثالية ، ومسافات توقف أقصر ، وثقة متزايدة للسائق ، خاصة في ظروف القيادة الصعبة. لا تتنازل عن السلامة ؛ استخدم وظيفة إعادة ضبط سائل الفرامل لتجربة قيادة متفوقة وآمنة في كل مرة.  تتيح هذه التكامل السلس إعادة ضبط سريعة وسهلة ، مما يعيدك إلى الطريق بثقة كاملة في دقة موثوقية نظام الفرامل لديك. إعادة ضبط سائل الفرامل بشكل صحيح بعد التغيير أمر ضروري للحفاظ على الأداء الأمثل وميزات السلامة في سيارتك BMW الفئة الثانية.
description.he: חוו ביצועי בלימה שיא עם תכונת איפוס נוזל בלמים החדשנית של סדרה 2. זה לא רק פריט תחזוקה שגרתי; זהו מרכיב קריטי להבטחת עוצמת בלימה עקבית ואמינה. לאחר החלפת נוזל בלמים, פונקציית איפוס נוזל הבלמים מכוילת במדויק את מערכת הבלימה המתקדמת, ומטיבה את רגישותה וזמן התגובה שלה. זה מבטיח יעילות בלימה אופטימלית, מרחקי בלימה קצרים יותר, ובטחון נהיגה משופר, במיוחד בתנאי נהיגה תובעניים. אל תתפשרו על הבטיחות; השתמשו בפונקציית איפוס נוזל הבלמים לחוויית נהיגה עליונה ובטוחה בכל פעם. האינטגרציה החלקה הזו מאפשרת איפוס מהיר וקל, ומחזירה אתכם לדרך עם ביטחון מלא בדיוק ואמינות מערכת הבלימה שלכם. איפוס נכון של נוזל הבלמים לאחר החלפה הוא חיוני לשמירה על הביצועים השיאיים ותכונות הבטיחות של ה-BMW סדרה 2 שלכם.

description.ar: حافظ على أداء محرك ذروة مع وظيفة إعادة تعيين زيت المحرك من سلسلة 5 G30. هذه الميزة المريحة تسمح لك بإعادة تعيين مؤشر الخدمة بسهولة بعد تغيير الزيت، مما يضمن تتبعًا دقيقًا لجدول صيانة سيارتك ويُعظم عمر المحرك. استمتع بالتكامل السلس والهندسة الدقيقة التي تُعرّف تجربة BMW.
description.he: שמרו על ביצועי שיא של המנוע עם פונקציית איפוס שמן המנוע של סדרת 5 G30. תכונה נוחה זו מאפשרת לכם לאפס בקלות את מדד השירות לאחר החלפת שמן, ומבטיחה מעקב מדויק אחר לוח הזמנים לתחזוקת הרכב שלכם וממקסמת את אורך חיי המנוע.  הנאה משילוב חלק והנדסה מדויקת המגדירים את חוויית BMW.

description.en: Experience precision braking every time with the BMW 2 Series' innovative Front Brake Pads Reset feature.  This isn't just about a simple warning light; it's about proactive maintenance and peak performance.  Our intelligent system monitors pad wear with exceptional accuracy, providing a timely and precise alert when a replacement is due.  Avoid unexpected brake failures and maintain optimal stopping power by staying informed. This sophisticated feature allows you to schedule brake pad replacement conveniently, maximizing the lifespan of your brakes while ensuring your safety and driving enjoyment.  Don't let worn brake pads compromise your driving experience – let the 2 Series' Front Brake Pads Reset keep you in complete control.
description.ar: اختبر دقة الفرامل في كل مرة مع ميزة إعادة ضبط فرامل الأقراص الأمامية المبتكرة من BMW الفئة 2.  لا يتعلق الأمر فقط بمؤشر تحذير بسيط؛ بل يتعلق الأمر بصيانة استباقية وأداءً مثالياً.  ترصد نظامنا الذكي تآكل الفرامل بدقة استثنائية، مما يوفر تنبيهًا دقيقًا وفي الوقت المناسب عند الحاجة إلى الاستبدال.  تجنب أعطال الفرامل غير المتوقعة وحافظ على قوة فرملة مثالية من خلال البقاء على اطلاع.  تتيح لك هذه الميزة المتطورة جدولة استبدال فرامل الأقراص بسهولة، مما يزيد من عمر فراملك مع ضمان سلامتك ومتعتك في القيادة.  لا تدع فرامل الأقراص البالية تُعيق تجربة القيادة لديك – دع ميزة إعادة ضبط فرامل الأقراص الأمامية من الفئة 2 تحافظ على سيطرتك الكاملة.
description.he: חוו את דיוק הבלימה בכל פעם עם תכונת איפוס רפידות הבלם הקדמיות החדשנית של BMW סדרה 2. זה לא רק עניין של נורה פשוטה; זהו עניין של תחזוקה יזומה וביצועים מיטביים. המערכת החכמה שלנו מנטרת את שחיקת הרפידות בדיוק יוצא דופן, ומספקת התראה מדויקת ובזמן הנכון כאשר יש צורך להחליף אותן. הימנעו מכשלים בלתי צפויים במערכת הבלימה ושמרו על כוח בלימה אופטימלי על ידי שמירה על מידע מעודכן. תכונה משוכללת זו מאפשרת לכם לתזמן החלפת רפידות בלם בנוחות, וממקסמת את אורך חייהן של הבלמים תוך שמירה על בטיחותכם והנאת הנהיגה שלכם. אל תתנו לרפידות בלם שחוקות לפגוע בחוויית הנהיגה שלכם – תנו לתכונת איפוס רפידות הבלם הקדמיות של סדרה 2 לשמור עליכם בשליטה מלאה.

description.en: Experience precise braking control and optimized performance with the BMW 2 Series' Rear Brake Pad Reset feature.  This isn't just about resetting a light; it's about ensuring your braking system operates at peak efficiency.  After replacing your rear brake pads, this intelligent system recalibrates the brake sensors for accurate wear monitoring and optimal Anti-lock Braking System (ABS) and Dynamic Stability Control (DSC) functionality.  This ensures consistent, reliable braking performance throughout the lifespan of your new pads, maximizing safety and extending the life of your brake system components.  Don't settle for compromised braking – experience the precision and peace of mind that comes with a properly reset system.  This simple yet crucial step, accessible through your vehicle's iDrive system, provides you with the control and confidence you deserve.

Maintain peak performance and keep your BMW 2 Series running smoothly with our intuitive Vehicle Check Reset feature.  This isn't just about clearing a warning light; it's about proactive vehicle health management.  A simple, in-car process allows you to reset service indicators after completing routine maintenance, ensuring your instrument cluster reflects the true state of your vehicle.  No more confusing warning lights or missed service appointments.  Vehicle Check Reset empowers you to stay informed and in control of your 2 Series' well-being, promoting long-term reliability and preserving the joy of driving.

Experience the thrill of the road with the 2 Series' Sport Displays.  These aren't just gauges; they're a dynamic extension of your driving experience.  Crisp, high-resolution graphics deliver vital performance data with breathtaking clarity, transforming your dashboard into a command center.  From a vibrant, customizable tachometer that pulses with the engine's rhythm to a comprehensive display of G-forces and lap times (where applicable), Sport Displays immerse you in the heart of the action.  Intuitive menus allow for easy personalization, letting you select the information most relevant to your driving style.  Forget static displays – with Sport Displays, the 2 Series transforms your daily commute into a spirited drive, providing you with real-time feedback and a visceral connection to the machine under your control.  This isn't just about seeing numbers; it's about feeling the performance.

Experience the ultimate in on-the-go entertainment with the BMW 2 Series' Video in Motion system.  While respecting all applicable local laws and regulations, this innovative feature allows select passengers to enjoy movies, TV shows, and other video content on the central infotainment display while the vehicle is in motion.  This doesn't just mean short clips;  prepare for immersive viewing experiences thanks to the high-resolution screen and seamless integration with your favorite streaming apps. Note:  The driver must always maintain full attention on the road, and the availability of video playback while driving may vary based on vehicle speed and local legal restrictions.  Video in Motion elevates your journeys from simple commutes to engaging adventures, ensuring everyone stays entertained during longer drives.   This feature is designed for passengers' enjoyment and does not compromise safety features.  For the ultimate cinematic experience on the road, choose the BMW 2 Series.

Effortlessly manage your towing needs with the innovative 2 Series Tow Hitch Display.  This isn't just a simple indicator; it's a sophisticated system seamlessly integrated into your infotainment screen.  Get real-time feedback on trailer connection status, ensuring safe and secure hitching every time.  Avoid costly mistakes and potential damage with clear visual cues that confirm proper alignment and prevent accidental disconnections. The Tow Hitch Display provides peace of mind, knowing your trailer is securely attached before you hit the road.  It's more than just convenience; it's intelligent towing assurance designed for the discerning 2 Series driver.

Experience unparalleled ease and sophistication with the 5 Times Comfort Turn Signals.  A gentle tap of the turn signal stalk activates five quick flashes, perfect for lane changes in tight spaces or indicating a subtle intention without overly intrusive signaling. This refined feature enhances both driving comfort and safety.
description.ar: استمتع بسهولة وتطور لا مثيل له مع مؤشرات الانعطاف المريحة خمس مرات. تعمل لمسة لطيفة على ذراع مؤشر الانعطاف على تنشيط خمس ومضات سريعة، مثالية لتغيير المسارات في الأماكن الضيقة أو للإشارة إلى نية خفية دون إشارة مزعجة للغاية. تعمل هذه الميزة المُحسّنة على تعزيز كل من راحة القيادة والسلامة.
description.he: חוו את הקלות והתחכום חסרי התקדים עם איתותי נוחות 5 פעמים. הקשה עדינה על ידית איתות הכיוון מפעילה חמש הבזקות מהירות, מושלם לשינויי נתיבים במרחבים צפופים או לאותת כוונה עדינה מבלי לאותת בצורה פולשנית מדי. תכונה משופרת זו משפרת הן את נוחות הנהיגה והן את הבטיחות.

description.en: Experience exhilarating performance with the 2 Series' meticulously engineered Speedometer Scale Display.  This isn't just a gauge; it's a visceral connection to the road. Feel the surge of power, monitor your speed with unwavering clarity, and experience driving redefined with the 2 Series' dynamic Speedometer Scale Display.  Its precision engineering and elegant presentation seamlessly integrate into the driver-focused cockpit, enhancing both the aesthetic appeal and driving experience.

Elevate your 2 Series driving experience with the Alpina Style Display.  This isn't just a cosmetic upgrade; it's a meticulously crafted digital instrument cluster that seamlessly integrates bespoke Alpina design cues with crucial performance data. Experience the thrill of driving with a vibrant, high-resolution display showcasing a unique Alpina-branded speedometer, tachometer, and intuitive interface.  The crisp graphics and customizable settings deliver a richer, more engaging driving experience, allowing you to monitor key performance metrics with unparalleled clarity. Command the road with the redesigned 2 Series Instrument Cluster Logo.  More than just a visual element, this meticulously crafted emblem projects a sense of refined power and bespoke luxury.  The vibrant, high-resolution display ensures crystal-clear visibility of the logo, seamlessly integrated into the driver's digital experience.  Its subtle yet striking presence reinforces the 2 Series' athletic character, serving as a constant reminder of the exhilarating performance waiting to be unleashed.  Experience the thrill of driving with a logo that reflects your individual style and the unwavering quality of BMW engineering.

Experience unparalleled control with the BMW 2 Series' innovative Speed Correction system.  This isn't just cruise control; it's predictive speed assistance.  Utilizing advanced GPS data and real-time speed limit recognition, Speed Correction seamlessly adjusts your vehicle's speed to adhere to posted limits, minimizing the risk of unintentional speeding violations.  Beyond simple adherence, the system anticipates upcoming speed changes, smoothly decelerating or accelerating as necessary for a comfortable and confident driving experience.  No more frantic glances at speedometers – focus on the road ahead while maintaining optimal speed and legal compliance. Speed Correction isn't just a feature; it’s a testament to the 2 Series' commitment to driver assistance and peace of mind.

Experience unparalleled convenience and safety with the 2 Series' innovative Mirror Dip feature.  When reversing, the passenger-side mirror automatically dips downwards, providing an unobstructed view of the curb and eliminating blind spots.  This subtle yet crucial adjustment significantly enhances maneuverability, especially in tight parking spaces or while navigating challenging environments.  No more awkward contortions or guesswork – simply engage reverse and let the intelligent Mirror Dip system take the strain, ensuring confident and precise parking every time.  This feature isn't just a luxury; it's a smart solution designed to bolster your confidence and enhance your driving experience.

Effortlessly enhance your parking experience with the BMW 2 Series' intelligent Mirror Dip Adjustment.  This innovative feature automatically lowers the passenger-side mirror when you engage reverse gear, providing a clear and unobstructed view of the curb and surrounding obstacles.  No more awkward maneuvering or relying on guesswork – simply engage reverse and benefit from significantly improved visibility, making parking in tight spaces a breeze.  This thoughtful addition isn't just convenient; it significantly reduces the risk of costly scrapes and collisions, enhancing both safety and your overall driving confidence.  Experience the seamless integration and precision engineering that defines the BMW driving experience.

Experience unparalleled driving precision with RLS Sensitivity in your BMW 5 Series G30.  This advanced system intelligently adjusts the responsiveness of your vehicle's stability control, seamlessly adapting to changing road conditions and your driving style for enhanced control and confidence.  Enjoy a more dynamic and intuitive driving experience, perfectly tailored to your needs.

Experience effortless security with Self Locking Time.  Program your BMW 5 Series G30 to automatically lock its doors after a pre-defined period following vehicle shutdown, eliminating the worry of inadvertently leaving your doors unlocked.  Enjoy enhanced peace of mind, knowing your vehicle is secure.

Experience unparalleled awareness on the road with the 5 Series G30's Assisted Driving View. This advanced system provides a comprehensive, bird's-eye perspective of your surroundings, enhancing situational awareness and making parking maneuvers and navigating tight spaces significantly easier and safer.  Benefit from a clearer understanding of your vehicle's position relative to obstacles, boosting both confidence and safety.

Effortlessly change lanes with a subtle flick of the turn signal.  Our advanced Automatic Lane Change system monitors surrounding traffic and seamlessly executes lane changes, enhancing both safety and driving comfort in the BMW 5 Series G30.  Experience confident and refined highway driving.

Experience the symphony of sound with the renowned Bower & Wilkins Diamond surround sound system.  Immerse yourself in a concert-hall quality audio experience, meticulously engineered to deliver pristine clarity and depth to every note, transforming your BMW 5 Series G30 into a mobile sanctuary of exceptional sound.

The BMW 5 Series G30's intelligent 12V battery registration system ensures seamless integration and optimal performance of your vehicle's electrical components.  This sophisticated system monitors battery health and automatically registers any replacement, maintaining peak efficiency and preventing potential electrical issues. Experience the unwavering reliability and refined performance expected from a BMW.

Command the symphony of your BMW 5 Series G30.  The Engine Sound Menu allows you to personalize the aural experience, selecting from various driving modes that precisely tailor the engine note to your desired intensity, from subtle refinement to exhilarating power.  Experience the ultimate fusion of performance and sensory engagement.

Experience unparalleled comfort even on the coldest days.  The BMW 5 Series G30's automatic steering wheel heating gently warms the wheel to your preferred temperature, ensuring a luxuriously warm and sure grip, regardless of the outside conditions.  Effortless luxury at your fingertips.

Experience the iconic elegance of Scandinavian design with the 5 Series G30's distinctive Daytime Running Lights (DRLs).  These sophisticated LED lights not only provide enhanced visibility for increased safety but also project a confident and modern aesthetic, perfectly complementing the car's dynamic lines.  The clean, minimalist design is a hallmark of Scandinavian style and seamlessly integrates into the 5 Series' refined presence.

Command absolute control over your auditory experience.  With Active Sound Design Deactivation, seamlessly switch between the exhilarating engine symphony and a more refined, understated driving ambiance, tailoring the acoustic landscape to your exact preference in your BMW 5 Series G30.

Experience the ultimate driving companion with CarPlay Fullscreen on your BMW 5 Series G30. Drive safer and more connected than ever before.

Maximize your driving range and minimize your environmental impact with this innovative feature.

Experience unparalleled serenity with Comfort+ Mode.  This meticulously engineered setting softens throttle response, adjusts suspension for supreme smoothness, and subtly alters steering for a truly relaxing driving experience, transforming even the most demanding journey into a haven of tranquility.  Embrace the ultimate in refined BMW comfort.

The BMW 5 Series G30's comprehensive Brake Lights Test ensures optimal functionality of your braking system's crucial visual warnings. This rigorous diagnostic check verifies the performance of all brake lights, illuminating potential issues before they compromise safety.  Proactive maintenance for confident, secure driving.

Experience optimized thermal management with the 5 Series G30's intelligent Radiator Blind.  This system actively opens and closes the radiator shutters, dynamically adjusting airflow to maintain optimal engine temperature for enhanced performance and fuel efficiency, all while minimizing drag and maximizing responsiveness.

In critical situations, BMW's Emergency Braking Lights rapidly flash your brake lights at full intensity, significantly increasing your visibility to following drivers and dramatically reducing the risk of rear-end collisions. This proactive safety feature provides an extra layer of protection for you and other road users, enhancing your overall driving experience with peace of mind.

The BMW 5 Series G30's Engine Fan Test, accessible via the onboard diagnostics system, allows for a comprehensive check of your cooling system's functionality.  This ensures optimal engine temperature regulation and prevents potential overheating issues, contributing to peak performance and longevity.  Proactive maintenance at your fingertips, for the ultimate driving experience.

Ensure optimal rear visibility during nighttime reversing maneuvers with the 5 Series G30's comprehensive reversing lights test.  This built-in diagnostic checks the functionality of all rear lights, alerting you to any potential issues before they compromise your safety and confidence on the road. Proactive maintenance for ultimate peace of mind.

The BMW 5 Series G30's rigorous Steering Wheel Vibration Test ensures optimal steering feel and responsiveness.  This meticulous process, performed during manufacturing, guarantees the precision and feedback you expect from a BMW, enhancing both driving dynamics and safety.

Ensure your BMW 5 Series G30's horn is functioning optimally with a simple, in-car test.  Quickly verify its sound and responsiveness, providing peace of mind and proactive maintenance for your driving safety.  A vital check for continued reliable performance.

The BMW 5 Series G30's rear fog lights undergo rigorous testing to ensure optimal visibility in challenging weather conditions.  These enhanced lights provide superior illumination and significantly improve safety during periods of reduced visibility, such as heavy fog or rain.  Your confidence and safety are paramount, and this testing ensures consistent, reliable performance.

The BMW 5 Series G30's Windscreen Washer Pump Test ensures peak performance of your washer system. Proactive maintenance for a consistently clear view of the road ahead.

The BMW 5 Series G30's Rear Seat Belts Reminder Menu proactively enhances safety by prompting drivers to ensure rear passengers are properly buckled.  This intelligent feature contributes to a more secure driving experience for everyone on board, reinforcing BMW's commitment to comprehensive occupant protection. Before you embark on your journey, the BMW 5 Series G30's Headlights Check proactively illuminates any malfunctioning headlights. Ensure optimal functionality of your BMW 5 Series G30's instrument cluster lighting with this comprehensive test. Maintain the pristine visual integrity of your cockpit by proactively addressing any lighting issues.

description.en: Experience unparalleled peace of mind with the BMW 2 Series' enhanced Emergency Braking Lights Sensitivity.  This sophisticated system goes beyond standard hazard lights, employing advanced sensors to detect imminent braking situations, even at lower speeds or in challenging conditions like heavy rain or fog.  When hard braking is detected, the system instantly activates the hazard lights with increased intensity and frequency, significantly improving rearward visibility and alerting following drivers much sooner than conventional systems. This proactive measure dramatically reduces the risk of rear-end collisions, providing an extra layer of safety for you and other road users.  Our engineers have meticulously calibrated the sensitivity to minimize false activations while maximizing effectiveness, ensuring a seamless and reliable experience.  Don't just drive; drive confidently with the 2 Series' superior emergency braking light response.
